name: Solar System (itch) (Dezert)
description:
Solar system simulator from Michigan State University course

  1. Add all 8 planets and Pluto.
    1. Venus spin in diferent direction like in real life.
  2. Add 4 moons for Jupiter.
  3. Add ring around Saturn 
  4. Add orange sun hallo.
  5. Change small camera background.
